plshades: Continuously shaded plot for Fortran 95

This is an overloaded function with a variety of argument lists which NEED DOCUMENTATION.

When called from Fortran 95, this overloaded routine has the same effect as when invoked from C. See examples/f95/x??f.f90 for various ways to call plshades from Fortran 95.
